problem_text_cn: 如图,过⊙O外一点P引⊙O的两条切线PA、PB,切点分别是A、B,OP交⊙O于点C,点D是优弧AB上不与点A、点B重合的一个动点,连接AD、CD,若∠APB=76°,则△ADC的度数为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the two tangents PA and PB leading to a point P outside ⊙O, the tangent points are respectively A and B, OP intersects ⊙O at point C, and point D is a moving point on the major arc AB that doesn't coincide with points A and B. Connect AD and CD, if ∠APB = N_0, then the degree of △ADC is ()
raw_answer: 解；如图,连接OB、OA．∵PA、PB是⊙O的切线,∴∠PBO=∠PAO=90°由四边形的内角和定理,得∠BOA=360°-90°-90°-76°=104°,∵∠OPB=∠OPA,∠OPB+∠POB=90°,∠OPA+∠POA=90°,∴∠POB=∠POA=52°．∵∠ADC=\frac{1}{2}∠AOC=26°,故选:A．
raw_comment: 本题考查了切线的性质、四边形的内角和定理、切线长定理、直角三角形的性质等知识,解题的关键啊灵活运用所学知识解决问题,学会添加常用辅助线,属于中考常考题型．
